long_description: The Kurgo Tru-Fit Smart Dog Harness serves double duty as an in-vehicle safety restraint and a walking harness. Keep your dog comfortable and safe both in and out of your car! Restraining your dog while riding in your car helps protect the dog, the driver and other passengers. Harness includes a seatbelt loop that can be used with any vehicle's seatbelt. 5 adjustment points provide a personalized fit for your dog; easy-on design lets you simply slip the harness over your dog's head and clip it in place around the midsection. The Kurgo Tru-Fit Smart Dog Harness features a broad, padded chest plate that offers protection and comfort.
short_description: The Kurgo Tru-Fit Smart Dog Harness serves double duty as an in-vehicle safety restraint and a walking harness. Keep your dog comfortable and safe both in and out of your car!
